title: UX Writer and Content Designer, Gemini
description: As a UX writer, you are an advocate for Google design, shaping product experiences by creating useful, meaningful text that helps users complete tasks.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Communication, Literature, Business, Marketing, a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
preferred_qualifications: 3 years of experience interacting with executive leadership.
responsibilities: Use writing and content design skills to create UI text that facilitates user navigation, as well as on-boarding, promos, error messages, instructional materials, and other components of the user experience.
